channel.title: POSLink UI Design and User Guide
channel.description: Recent content on POSLink UI Design and User Guide

item.description: Common Text Intents # This page describes all common implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to enter text. Enter Amount # Action TextEntry.ACTION_ENTER_AMOUNT Category TextEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are:

Host Dependent Text Intents # This page describes all implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to enter text. Enter Reference Number # Action TextEntry.ACTION_ENTER_ADDRESS Category TextEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory
